title: 01/08/21 - DPS - Best Of
itunes:title: 01/08/21 - DPS - Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP has some more information about the National Title game between Alabama and Ohio State Monday. Is the Big Ten still advocating to push the game back? Sean Salisbury, Houston Sports host of the Sean Salisbury show joins us to discuss the Deshaun Watson situation. What are the chances he actually gets traded? Also Adam Thielen, Vikings Wide Receiver joins the show to preview this weekend's Wild Card matchups. Which team would he bet on to represent the NFC in the Super Bowl?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
